tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TrafficData (
  date DATE,
  time TIME,
  location VARCHAR,
  vehicle_count INT,
  speed INT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_make VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_lanes (
    lane_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lane_type VARCHAR(50),
    lane_location VARCHAR(100),
    lane_capacity INT,
    lane_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    incident_location VARCHAR(100),
    incident_description TEXT,
    incident_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    report_time TIME,
    report_description TEXT,
    report_author VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
    traffic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR,
    vehicle_count INT,
    congestion_level VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date_date TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE road_network (
    road_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    road_name VARCHAR,
    road_length FLOAT,
    road_type VARCHAR,
    max_speed_limit INT
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR,
    incident_type VARCHAR,
    description TEXT
);
